heading: Corrupted Grotto Dungeon Guide
content: Corrupted Grotto is a dungeon in the west region of Kehjistan. Clearing the dungeon for the first time rewards you with the , a powerful choice for Necromancers using Corpse Tendrils. This dungeon may cause you to backtrack a bit in the beginning to find and kill all of the Animus Carriers but is otherwise easy to progress. Watch out for the demons in the second zone, which move erratically and deal high damage. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
